author: Al Jazeera
title: Pope Francis donates respirators as Vatican steps up virus plan
description: The Vatican is testing the dozens of priests who live in the pope's residence amid fears of a potential flare-up.
content:
Pope Francis has donated 30 respirators to hospitals in areas hardest hit by the coronavirus pandemic, the Vatican said on Thursday.
A statement from the office of the papal almoner, Cardinal Konrad Krajewski, did not say where they would be sent, or if any … [+3775 chars]
